name: UpMenu – Online ordering for restaurants
author: UpMenu

sections.description: UpMenu is everything your restaurant needs for you to take your customers’ orders directly from your website or app while protecting your bottom line from third-party aggregators and enabling you to grow your revenue.
sections.installation:
1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Visit the UpMenu page in the main WordPress admin menu.
  4. Log in to your UpMenu account or sign up if you don’t have an UpMenu account yet.
  5. Select your UpMenu account.
  6. Configure the appearance of your online ordering on the ‘Widgets’ page.
  7. Copy the shortcode from the ‘Widgets’ menu and paste it on your website.
sections.changelog:
3.0

  • Third version of plugin

2.0

  • Second version of plugin

1.0

  • First version of plugin

short_description: This plugin allows you to easily integrate UpMenu with your Wordpress website.
description: UpMenu is everything your restaurant needs for you to take your customers’ orders directly from your website or app while protecting your bottom line from third-party aggregators and enabling you to grow your revenue.
